item.title: Bacon Combo Graph
item.description: Bacon Combo Graph is an Unreal Engine plugin (UE5.3+) designed to help you build complex, animation-driven combat systems fast and easy

item.title: Documentation
item.description:
Node Types

Root Node

Root node is the starting point of the graph. When the graph resets, it returns to this node.

Execution Node

Used to perform actions, such as playing animations, consuming mana, or triggering gameplay effects.

  • Each Execution Node can contain multiple Action Passes.
  • Passes are executed from top to bottom.
  • If any pass fails, execution stops and follows the Fail output pin.

Creating a Custom Action Pass

Create a custom Action Pass by inheriting from UComboActionPass.

item.title: Quick Start
item.description:
1. Prepare your ACharacter

Make sure your Character blueprint or C++ has these components added:

  • AnimationDrivenComponent – For listening to animation montage data and signaling it to other systems (e.g., gameplay abilities)
  • ComboManagerComponent – For managing the combo graph
GAS Users

Make sure your Character has AbilitySystemComponent and is derived from UContextAbilitySystemComponent.
See ComboBasicCharacter.h for a default implementation.
